Update on Testnet for TF Grid 3.0

Testnet for TF Grid 3.0 is fully available for testing, both for connecting infrastructure and for deploying workloads!

Sam Taggart

15 November 2021

🚨 Testnet for TF Grid 3.0 is fully available for testing, both for connecting infrastructure and for deploying workloads!


  • Learn how to get started on Grid 3.0
  • Get started deploying workloads using Terraform

Please note TF Grid 3.0 Portal is now available on Testnet, which makes it even easier and more seamless to perform some of the tasks in the videos above.


This is an important concrete step in the journey for a decentralized Internet!


If you’re want to get involved in testing Grid 3.0, please join our testing group.

Great Results on Grid 2.4 Testing!

We still need more people willing to test – join in!

SLOGAN
